text: Broken Promise () is a 2009 drama film directed by Jiří Chlumský and starring , Ondřej Vetchý and . The film was Slovakia's submission to the 82nd Academy Awards for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film. The film won the main prize at the 2009 Los Angeles Jewish Film Festival. Broken Promise received nine nominations at the 2010 Sun in a Net Awards, but succeeded in winning just one, awarded to Michal Novinski for the film's music. == Cast == * *Ondřej Vetchý * as Eva == See also == *List of Slovak submissions for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film *List of submissions to the 82nd Academy Awards for Best Foreign Language Film == References == == External links == * * Broken Promise at Eurochannel Category:2000s war drama films Category:Czech films Category:Slovak films Category:Czech war drama films Category:Slovak drama films Category:2009 drama films
title: Broken Promise
